JOB DESCRIPTION: Other Openings   Django Developer (Hyderabad, IN)   Android Developer (Hyderabad, IN)   Python Developer (Hyderabad, IN)   iOS Developer (Hyderabad, IN)   Web Designer (Hyderabad, IN)   Front End Web Developer (Hyderabad, IN)   Why Work at Lintel? Lintel helps build the flagship products for tech startups, creating new technologies and new markets in the process. We also partner with more established companies to prototype products, create new online services, and set up server environments to make them all highly available and super scalable. As an Lintel team member, you will constantly be working on a wide variety of projects using a full stack of our favorite technologies. Working at Lintel is never boring. On any given day, an Lintel developer could work on a number of different projects for several different clients. Lintel is a great place for developers to deepen their skills and widen their exposure. If you're a motivated developer who is willing to learn, willing to work hard, and willing to become an integral member of the Lintel team, we want to talk to you.   Proficiency in Angular JS. Experience with Javascript, CSS, HTML and REST are a must. We also do lots of development in iOS(Objective C), Android, Python, Django, LESS, Linux, Bash, Salt, PostgreSQL, Git, FreeSWITCH, and Open SIPS. Knowing them is nice, but not required.   Please reply with your resume, wage requirements, and/or any portfolio materials you might have. If your wage requirements make sense for your level of skill/experience, you're very likely to get an interview.   Talented developers who can perform a variety of tasks using Angular JS and are willing to work in an exciting and demanding  environment.     10 A.M. - 6 P.M. (IST)
